subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Robert Horry hit a 3-pointer late Thursday night, an act so natural, so familiar, so amusingly routine that it seemed as if every N.B.A. finals must have started this way.
snippet: Robert Horry hit a 3-pointer late Thursday night, an act so natural, so familiar, so amusingly routine that it seemed as if every N.B.A. finals must have started this way.
